snippet: After a news conference on Thursday announcing that he would not run for mayor of Moscow in the fall, Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ owner, also said that there was a shortage of N.B.A. coaches with star power.
abstract: After a news conference on Thursday announcing that he would not run for mayor of Moscow in the fall, Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ owner, also said that there was a shortage of N.B.A. coaches with star power.

headline.main: Nets Owner Calls Jason Kidd a Born Coach
headline.print_headline: Nets’ Owner Says Kidd Is a Natural as a Coach
